title: #EID_47597_RECSBox_EthernetInterface.v0_1_0

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

MaxSpeedMbps.description: This is the maximum speed in Mbps of this interface.
MaxSpeedMbps.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the nominal link speed of the interface in Mbps.

EthernetInterface.description: Base type for an Oem object.
EthernetInterface.longDescription: This object represents the base type for an Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.
